Class Pollutant

  • java.lang.Object
    • enemies.Enemy
      • enemies.Pollutant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, misc.Renderable, misc.Tickable

    public class Pollutant
extends enemies.Enemy
    The Pollutant class is used to model different types of pollutants

    abraham
